name: MetricItem
description: A reusable metric display component for showing values with labels, units, trends, and threshold-based status indicators.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the metric item

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label text describing the metric

properties.name: value
properties.description: The current value of the metric

properties.name: unit
properties.description: The unit of measurement for the metric value

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: Error threshold value - when exceeded, metric shows error state

properties.name: warningThreshold
properties.description: Warning threshold value - when exceeded, metric shows warning state

properties.name: container
properties.description: Container element to append the metric to

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Optional icon HTML to display with the metric

methods.name: updateValue
methods.description: Updates the metric value and refreshes status indicators

methods.name: updateStatus
methods.description: Updates the status class based on threshold comparison

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Removes the metric item from DOM and cleans up

methods.name: getElement
methods.description: Returns the DOM element of the metric item

methods.name: updateValue
methods.description: Updates the metric value (Web Component only)

methods.name: setThreshold
methods.description: Sets the error threshold (Web Component only)

methods.name: setTrend
methods.description: Sets the trend indicator (Web Component only)

examples.title: Basic Metric
examples.description: Simple metric with label and value

examples.title: Metric with Thresholds
examples.description: Metric with warning and error thresholds
examples.code:
<dotbox-metric 
  label="Memory Usage" 
  value="85" 
  unit="%" 
  warning-threshold="70" 
  threshold="90"
></dotbox-metric>

examples.title: Metric with Trend
examples.code:
<dotbox-metric label="Revenue" value="12500" unit="$" trend="up"></dotbox-metric>
<dotbox-metric label="Expenses" value="8200" unit="$" trend="down"></dotbox-metric>
<dotbox-metric label="Profit Margin" value="15" unit="%" trend="stable"></dotbox-metric>

examples.title: Metric with Icon
examples.code:

  label="Active Users" 
  value="1,234"

examples.title: System Metrics Dashboard
examples.code:
<dotbox-metric label="CPU" value="23" unit="%" warning-threshold="70" threshold="90"></dotbox-metric>
<dotbox-metric label="RAM" value="67" unit="%" warning-threshold="70" threshold="90"></dotbox-metric>
<dotbox-metric label="Disk" value="89" unit="%" warning-threshold="70" threshold="90"></dotbox-metric>
<dotbox-metric label="Network" value="12" unit="MB/s" trend="stable"></dotbox-metric>
